meanings.sent1: Please shut the door before leaving the room.

meanings.sent4: Her laughter shut out all the worries from my mind.

meanings.sent4: His brain seemed to shut off when he heard the bad news.

meanings.definition: To move into a closed position
meanings.sent1: The flowers shut at night and bloom in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The umbrella shut quickly as the rain stopped.
meanings.sent3: The clam shut its shell tightly to hide from the curious child.
meanings.sent4: The gate shut with a loud bang, startling the cat.
meanings.sent5: The trap shut on the mouse, ending its quest for cheese.
